content: {"name": "Meals on Wheels North Jersey", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A home assessment is required for all clients who would like to be considered for the *subsidized meal program. Services are provided through the Bergen County Division of Senior Services at no charge for eligible clients.\n *This program provides one (1) hot meal, one milk, one juice, one piece of fruit and two slices of bread. The cost of any additional meals such as a cold sandwich will be the responsibility of the client. There is no required deposit once accepted into this program. \n Serves Bergen County", "email": "", "url": "https://mealsonwheelsnorthjersey.org/meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "100 Madison Avenue", "address_2": "Suite 3", "city": "Westwood", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07675", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9940907, "longitude": -74.03620889999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 358-0050", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery available for seniors & those adults with disabilities"}]}
